ðŸŽƒ Once upon a midnight dreary, in a haunted library...

Bonnie Bones floated through the dusty halls, carrying ancient scrolls of knowledge. "Learning is in my bones!" they whispered to the shadows.

The subject of Direct text input had always been mysterious, but tonight it would become clear. Professor Ghostly appeared with a dramatic flourish, cape billowing in the supernatural breeze.

"Boo-tiful learning awaits!" they declared, pointing to the glowing text that materialized in the air:

Test content for retrieval

As the clock struck midnight, the knowledge began to make sense. The spooky characters had worked their magic, transforming dry facts into memorable wisdom.

And so, dear student, the lesson was learned in the most delightfully frightful way! ðŸ‘»ðŸ“š
